content: Hey everyone! I'm thinking we should watch Iron Man first, then Captain America. Thoughts?
I vote for starting with Captain America: The First Avenger, chronological order!
Iron Man came first though! I say release order is better.
I can bring popcorn and snacks for everyone!
Perfect! I'll set up the living room with extra seating.
Everyone ready for the mountains? Remember to pack warm clothes!
I'll bring some hiking snacks for everyone.
I have an extra tent if anyone needs it.
I'll drive if anyone needs a ride. My SUV can fit 5 people plus gear.
I've made reservations at three restaurants for our food tour. Should be amazing!
Can't wait! Do we need to bring anything?
Just your appetite! I've arranged for a set menu at each place.
Exciting news! Michelle Rivera confirmed for our virtual Q&A next week.
Amazing! I just finished her book last night. So many questions!
Registration for the 5K is now open. I'll send the team signup link.
Anyone want to meet for a practice run this weekend?
